images.copyright: Boats resting between the Granville Bridge and the Burrard Bridge in False Creek, Vancouver (© Greg Norgaard/Alamy Stock Photo)
images.title: Boating enthusiasts unite
images.caption: Boating enthusiasts unite
images.desc: Today marks the last day of the Vancouver International Boat Show held at BC Place and Granville Island, pictured here. Boating enthusiasts gather here every year to take in the various boating models and accessories. Alongside the vibrant displays are a series of informative demonstrations held by experts from the industry. Dubbed as the largest boat show in western Canada, the Vancouver International Boat Show easily attracts at least 30,000 visitors to the event.
